title: Amidst the elation, Tories must consider the damage this deal does to the Union
text:
A forensic examination suggests this is a much worse deal than Theresa May's for Northern Ireland

In June, Boris Johnson told an audience of Northern Irish Conservative party members that “under no circumstances” would he allow anyone to create any kind of division down the Irish Sea. Unfortunately for the audience, and everyone else who supports the Union, he has done exactly that.

Under this new Treaty, Northern Ireland may technically remain in the UK Customs union but practically it's in the EU Customs Union. To be specific - Article 3 locks it in. And that means Great Britain would practically be forced to check goods coming across from Northern Ireland.

The Backstop may state that the...
description: A forensic examination suggests this is a much worse deal than Theresa May's for Northern Ireland
